qas.question: What is the name of the only medical center on Norfolk Island?
What are visitors of Norfolk Island recommended to purchase?
Where are Norfolk Island patients who need serious treatment flown to?
Who handles serious medical emergencies on Norfolk Island?
Who staffs the one ambulance available on Norfolk Island?
What is one of many medical centers on Norfolk Island?
What are visitors of Norfolk Island recommended to sell?
Where are Norfolk Island patients who need serious treatment imprisoned?
Who handles non-serious medical emergencies on Norfolk Island?
Who broke the one ambulance available on Norfolk Island?

context: <a0_0><b5_0>Norfolk Island Hospital<b5_0/><a0_0/> is the only medical centre on the island. Medicare and the Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme do not cover Norfolk Island. All visitors to Norfolk Island, including Australians, are recommended to purchase <a1_0><b6_0>travel insurance<b6_0/><a1_0/>. Although the hospital can perform minor surgery, serious medical conditions are not permitted to be treated on the island and patients are flown back to <a2_0><b7_0>mainland Australia<b7_0/><a2_0/>. Air charter transport can cost in the order of A$30,000. For serious emergencies, medical evacuations are provided by <a3_0><b8_0>the Royal Australian Air Force<b8_0/><a3_0/>. The island has one ambulance staffed by <a4_0><b9_0>St John Ambulance Australia volunteers<b9_0/><a4_0/>.
